core.tut.pori.utils

Class XMLFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.utils.XMLFormatter

  • public class XMLFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    XML formatter. This class can be used to marshal objects to xml output, and unmarshal objects from xml input.
